Description: Fragment of an ear- or hair-ring with subtle, angular edges, remains of a whitish glazing preserved, faience, probably original light green. Triangular in section, broken off at both ends.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), E12.6J, under threshold
Bibliographic references: Spencer 1997 / Amara West I, The Architectural Report (p. 192)
